channel.title: Knowledge Base on hypathia.net
channel.description: Recent content in Knowledge Base on hypathia.net

item.description: Symptoms All paths of an exported resources will show 503 Service Temporarily Unavailable for all paths. Cause multiple ingress objects expose the same hostname How to find it if site.example.com is the exposed name: ~$ kubectl get ingress --all-namespaces -o wide | grep site.example.com namespace1 name-ingress site.example.com 80, 443 4d mynamespace my-ingress site.example.com 80, 443 5d production prod-ingress site.example.com 80, 443 18h
